name: Always Nude (Unscented) - Whipped Argan Oil Refillable Firming Body Butter Jar
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is:u00a0An air-whipped full-body moisturizer with argan oil that rapidly soaks in, delivering juicy firmness, intense hydration, and an all-over glow.Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..- Avocado Oil: Known to improve the look of skin elasticity and firmness, rich in antioxidants..- Shea Butter: Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...What Else You Need to Know: This body butter absorbs rapidly on dry skin for a velvety-soft and firming finish that lasts all day. Responsibly sourced argan is whipped to creamy perfection with 100 percent plant-based fragrances in a lightweight yet rich formula. With the refill system, top up your amber glass jar and reuse forever. Perfect for extra-sensitive types, this unscented formula has only the faint, softly nutty smell inherent to argan oil. In the mood for something scented? This iconic formula also comes in a variety of elevated, 100 percent plant-based fragrances...Research Results:u00a0In a consumer perception survey of 39 people using the body butter on their thighs, stomach, and arms:.- 100% agreed their skin felt deeply hydrated and moisturized throughout the day after one use.- 97% agreed that the product provided an instant glow after one use.- 97% saw a noticeable improvement in firmness and tone after 2 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Argan Oil:  An abundant source of essential fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamin E..-Avocado Oil:  Known to improve skin elasticity and firmness; rich in antioxidants..-Shea Butter:  Known to moisturize and soothe, helping skin stay supple...Aqua (Water)**, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil**, Glyceryl Stearate**, Glycerin**, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter**, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyl Dimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract**, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract**, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract**, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract**, Squalane**, Beta-Carotene**, Tocopherol**, Allantoin**, Panthenol**, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate**, Polysorbate-60**, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol**, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. ..Organic.*.Naturally Derived.**..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage generously into skin for an instant moisture boost..Josieu2019s tip:.-For best results, use after showering when pores are open and receptive to the whipped, velvety goodness....Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the cap of the jar, remove red liner from inside the cap, rinse both cap and jar thoroughly, and drop the separated jar and cap in your at-home recycling bin..-Liner can be recycled through TerraCycle. Flatten product box and drop in your at-home recycling bin..-Recycle pouch through TerraCycle....Refill Product Instructions:.-With the refill pouches, you can top up your gorgeous amber glass jar and reuse it forever. Each pouch refills the 6 oz. jar 2.25 times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most moisturizing product Iu2019ve ever used,it gives my skin an instant glow. Paired well with the Vanilla Vibezzz Scrub. Unlike most body butters containing Argan Oil,this one isnu2019t sticky and doesnu2019t feel greasy. My skin drinks up this butter. A little goes a long way,it holds whatever fragrance I spray on top of it. My sensitive skin responds well to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love a good unscented body butter! Price is a little woo , but i enjoyed using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went in stores to smell the scents first and wasnu2019t a fan of the smells; HOWEVER, the unscented is freaking fantastic. My body is so dang soft. I will be buying the refill for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am NOT a lotion girl but my skin has become dry now that I'm getting older. I LOVE this body butter. It leaves a beautiful non-sticky, non-greasy glow and is so moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely one of the best lotions Iu2019ve purchased. Itu2019s like rubbing silk into your skin.  I love the refillable pouch too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased both the 6 oz jar along with another cream 6 oz in a jar. I use both on the same areas, and the same amount. This one is less than half full after having it a couple weeks. I've used them both sparingly as I don't get paid again in a while. I don't know if this jar was a returned item that someone previously used. I'm really upset as this is not a inexpensive product. I don't know if you can tell in the photo this brand has a lot more missing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this unscented body butter!  unscented items are hard to find. this makes my skin soft without being real greasy.  would love to try other josie products..maybe new ones coming?  josie makeup would be nice to have at sephora. Hopefully she doesn't just make this product only..years ago she offered makeup sticks and makeup quad pallette. miss those!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i am literally obsessed with this stuff! Apply it before bed and sometimes reapply in the morning and leaves my skin glowing all day. its helped restore the moisture in my skin long-term. will definitely be a staple in my cabinet for a long while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great packaging upgrade; same amazing body moisturizer that I always come back to. Unscented is truly unscented, and is not oily or sticky. Great for sensitive and dry skin without being heavy.

reviews.review_title: A must have for summer legs!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this body butter! I have been using it for years and have found it to be the most moisturizing body butter ever. It goes on easily with no greasy feeling. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A great soothing body moisturizer . Nice and thick. Clean @ Sephora. Unscented works for me, but the other scents are great.  Like this as a travel size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this body lotion is so good. I like how there's no scent to it. I'm surprise because usually there's a coconut oil and butter scent that is very strong. overall, it's really good, but I feel like you can find a better dupe somewhere else that's cheaper with the same ingredient

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this unscented body butter!  unscented items are hard to find. this makes my skin soft without being real greasy.  would love to try other josie products..maybe new ones coming?  josie makeup would be nice to have at sephora. Hopefully she doesn't just make this product only..years ago she offered makeup sticks and makeup quad pallette. miss those!
